Reviews.Title: “A nightmare from hell”

Reviews.Content: ive alexander hotel 2010 recommend travelers stay hotel fairly expensive compared hotels victoria months manage hotel own owner answered phone didnt care happened hotel chambermaid receptionist janitor manager breakfast cook pleasant stay london search hotel

Reviews.Title: “bed bugs rooms!!”
Reviews.Author: mariana t
Reviews.Content: yeah name hotel call bed bugs eat free cant believe people dont clean stayed 2 nights family paid 130 pounds night dont worth 3 russian girls dont speak english recepcionist kitchen cleaning talk brother bitten beg bugs looking beautiful vacations pictures free breadfast day food horrible servise please hope owner hotel atention

Reviews.Title: “Bedbugs, lousy service, no sleep, no refund”
Reviews.Author: rogeiro
Reviews.Content: london september bargain 70 pounds night victoria whereabouts night assigned 2 below average worst bitten bedbugs morning girl spain acts cook cleaning staff receptionist role switched 3 3 greeted worn carpet hole floor step broken wood couple rusty nails bathroom tiny shower hitting shower valve inevitably changing freezing scalding water faucet outside tiny bathroom left bedbugs third night found lying beds staff unavailable apart receptionist course spite efforts offer valid solution paid fourth night decided leave paid half rate cleaner easy hotel accross street summary paid 4 nights stayed 3 slept night manager guy goes name raphael weeks answer mobile offered refund fourth night havent believe hotel location am alive 2block range alexander hotel 10 hotels 3 comparable rates dont waste money comfortable stay victoria station

Reviews.Title: “Absolute hell!!”
Reviews.Author: Lakesgirl88
Reviews.Content: stayed nights september trip organized boyfriends birthday 2 due financial chose london supposed romantic break trip hell hotel totally responsible outside looks heart sink moment set foot inside peeling wall paper dirty carpets dingy worse checked rude sultry receptionist didnt didnt tell breakfast times check time attempts lock faulty safe reliable hanging inside cry actually greeted disgusting smell compared sewer black mold peeling wall paper window shut properly dirty bathroom pubic hair glass horrible view tiny yard filthy carpet wet constantly immediately complained moved told checked wasnt paid deposit credit card details charge loss revenue walked sleep trip walls paper thin hear doors activities snoring ground floor dodgy door lock window wouldnt close left feeling incredibly unsafe anxious breakfast awful cold toast coffee tar milk microwave scrambled eggs green bacon raw service terrible food poisoning needless skipped breakfast morning checked embarrassing incident housekeeper getting dressed despite shouting complained check told manager contact sending daily emails placing daily phone calls heard manager mobile ignores doesnt answer messages mother left hotel disgusting condemned am contacting environmental health bad budget pay experienced stay

Reviews.Title: “Probably THE worst hotel I have ever stayed in”

Reviews.Content: pictures website look lovely hotel minute walked crack front door receptionist nice understand toilet paper 6pm obvious set 2 reception soon door carpets thread bare en suite tried turnaround youd stuck massive crack sink bathroom carpets filthy curtains hanging lamp shade teh 80s dirt attached massive dust attached easily 5 ols marks wall descibe poo im pretty bit bed lovely bug red mark view prison looked nicer broken glass barbed wire look nice food ok dining damp running walls toilet decided flush hear water running outside leaking wall instead shower lack cold water meant boiling hot water wouldnt recommend hotel flea shabby dog knocking disguisting
